item.description:
Jesse Freidin -San Francisco's Best Dog Photographer of 2010 + 2011, owner of a Boston Terrier, and a lover of frenchies- will be at the Wellfleet Flea Market every weekend in August taking instant dog photographs in his mini circus tent photo studio! That’s 8/6-8/7, 8/13-8/14, 8/20-8/21, 8/27-8/28.

 

Clyde & I are thinking...attend the flea market for treasure hunting, get a unique frenchie portrait done, go hang out at the Provincetown Pilgrim Bark Park, head over to Truro Beach later in the afternoon, then go back to the flea market which turns into a drive-in theater at night. All with your favorite frenchie in tow!!


Obviously with the hot summer weather we'll have to wait and see the forecasts if you guys want to set-up a specific Saturday or Sunday to go together.

 

http://jessefreidin.com/blog/summertime-circus-machinebay-areas-best-dog-photographer-jesse-freidin
http://www.wellfleetcinemas.com/
http://www.provincetowndogpark.org/

 

If you're looking to make a weekend of it, I've found some frenchie friendly hotels/motels/inns/campgrounds in the area...

http://www.breakwatermotel.com
http://www.outerreachresort.com
http://www.capecodopi.com
http://64.38.40.139/~mainstay
http://www.innattheoaks.com
http://www.gabriels.com
http://abcamping.net/abcapecod/index.php
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red & white striped circus tent!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Wellfleet Flea Market & Drive-in, Provincetown Pilgrim Bark Park, Truro Beaches
